title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error for valid *interface method expression
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/r0bgT9Hat_

produces:

prog.go:8: internal compiler error: missing base type for interface { m() int }

This is a valid package and should compile w/o errors. The similar

http://play.golang.org/p/qhEXhilcet

is ok.
